author: Not available

text.0: Ic þe mæg eaðe      ealdum and leasum
text.101: mid drycræftum,      þeah hio gedon meahte
text.106: Swylcum and swylcum      þu meaht sweotole ongitan
text.107: þæt ðæs lichoman      listas and cræftas
text.108: of ðæm mode cumað      monna gehwylcum,
text.109: anlepra ælc.      þu meaht eaðe ongitan
text.11: þæt on þa tide      Troia gewin
text.112: lænes lichoman.      Ne þearf leoda nan
text.113: wenan þære wyrde      þæt þæt werige flæsc
text.118: þone lichoman      lit þider hit wile.
text.12: wearð under wolcnum.      For wiges heard
text.15: lædde ofer lagustream,      sæt longe ðær
text.16: tyn winter full.      þa sio tid gelomp
text.17: þæt hi ðæt rice      geræht hæfdon,
text.2: efne ðisse ilcan      þe wit ymb sprecað.
text.21: ðracia cining,      þæt he þonan moste,
text.22: he let him behindan      hyrnde ciolas
text.26: ðriereðre ceol;      þæt bið ðæt mæste
text.27: Creciscra scipa.      þa wearð ceald weder,
text.28: stearc storma gelac;      stunede sio brune
text.29: yð wið oðre,      ut feor adraf
text.3: Hit gesælde gio      on sume tide
text.31: up on þæt igland      þær Apolines
text.34: Iobes eafora,      se wæs gio cyning.
text.36: gumena gehwylcum      þæt he good wære,
text.37: hehst and halgost;      swa se hlaford þa
text.38: þæt dysige folc      on gedwolan lædde,
text.40: forðæm he wæs mid rihte      rices hirde,
text.42: þæt on ða tide      þeoda æghwilc
text.43: hæfdon heora hlaford      for ðone hehstan god,
text.44: and weorðodon      swa swa wuldres cining,
text.45: gif he to ðæm rice wæs      on rihte boren.
text.46: Wæs þæs Iobes fæder      god eac swa he;
text.48: heton, hæleða bearn.      Hæfdon ða mægða
text.49: ælcne æfter oðrum      for ecne god.
text.60: eallre þære mænige      þe hire mid wunode
text.63: and he eac swa same      ealle mægne
text.64: efne swa swiðe      hi on sefan lufode,
text.65: þæt he to his earde      ænige nyste
text.67: ac he mid þæm wife      wunode siððan,
text.68: oððæt him ne meahte      monna ænig
text.70: ac hi for ðæm yrmðum      eardes lyste;
text.73: sædon þæt hio sceolde      mid hire scinlace
text.77: and mid racentan eac      ræpan mænigne.
text.78: Sume hi to wulfum wurdon,      ne meahton þonne word forðbringan,
text.81: ðonne hi sares hwæt      siofian scioldon.
text.82: þa ðe leon wæron      ongunnon laðlice
text.83: yrrenga ryn      a ðonne hi sceoldon
text.86: to sumum diore,      swelcum he æror
text.88: butan þam cyninge,      þe sio cwen lufode.
text.90: mennisces metes,      ac hi ma lufedon
text.91: diora drohtað,      swa hit gedefe ne wæs.
text.94: hæfde anra gehwylc      his agen mod,
text.95: þæt wæs þeah swiðe      sorgum gebunden
text.96: for ðæm earfoðum      þe him on sæton.
text.97: Hwæt, ða dysegan men      þe ðysum drycræftum
text.99: wisson hwæðre      þæt þæt gewit ne mæg

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
